identity.name: CareerIQ
identity.aesthetic: Dark Mode Premium (Netflix/Apple style), Cinematic, High Contrast

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for body text, UI elements, data labels.

mono.usage: Use for data values, code snippets, and 'intelligence' metrics.

rules: Use asymmetry in the hero section.
Do not center everything. Use left-align for serious content.
Use 'sticky' scrolling sections for 'How it Works'.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-4 backdrop-blur-md

cards.style: bg-black/40 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-2xl p-8 hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-primary/20 h-14 rounded-xl text-lg

visual_assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with thin stroke widths (1.5px) for elegance.

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, ease: [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] }}

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. CLEANUP: Remove standard React logos and 'App.css' centering.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to 'index.css' immediately.
4. THEME: Force dark mode in 'index.html' by adding class='dark' to the html tag.
5. LANDING: Build the landing page using the 'Tetris Grid' layout. Do not use standard Bootstrap columns.
6. ORDER FLOW: Make the order page feel like a 'Mission Control' setup. Step-by-step, high precision.
7. REPORT: The report page is the product. It must look like a high-end financial terminal or military dashboard.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Avoid 'Inter' font. Use 'Syne' for headings to stand out.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Every interactive element must have a hover state.
